com.horse.pokemon.AnimationEngine

Class AnimationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.horse.pokemon.AnimationEngine.AnimationManager

  • public class AnimationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for getting an Animation instance of given pieces of information.
    See Also:
    Animation, TextureRegion, Texture, Array

    • Method Detail

      • getAnimation

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> getAnimation(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture textureSheet,
                                                                                                                int frames,
                                                                                                                float frameDuration,
                                                                                                                int[] xPositions,
                                                                                                                int[] yPositions,
                                                                                                                int frameWidth,
                                                                                                                int frameHeight)
        Method for organizing an Animation object with the given paramters when the action strip has altering x-positions and y-positions.
        Parameters:
        textureSheet - Texture representing all the frames for animation.
        frames - Amount of animation pictures for a specific action.
        frameDuration - The time between frames in seconds.
        xPositions - The left-most position of each frame in order. Should be same length as parameter frames.
        yPositions - The upper-most position of each frame in order. Should be same length as parameter frames.
        frameWidth - The standard width of a single frame.
        frameHeight - The standard height of a single frame.
        Returns:
        Animation instance representing an object's specific action for graphical use.

      • getAnimation

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> getAnimation(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture textureSheet,
                                                                                                                int frames,
                                                                                                                float frameDuration,
                                                                                                                int[] xPositions,
                                                                                                                int yPosition,
                                                                                                                int frameWidth,
                                                                                                                int frameHeight)
        Method for organizing an Animation object with the given paramters when the action strip is all horizontal with the same top-most y-position.
        Parameters:
        textureSheet - Texture representing all the frames for animation.
        frames - Amount of animation pictures for a specific action.
        frameDuration - The time between frames in seconds.
        xPositions - The left-most position of each frame in order. Should be same length as parameter frames.
        yPosition - The upper-most position of all frames. Should be same length as parameter frames.
        frameWidth - The standard width of a single frame.
        frameHeight - The standard height of a single frame.
        Returns:
        Animation instance representing an object's specific action for graphical use.

      • getAnimation

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> getAnimation(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture textureSheet,
                                                                                                                int frames,
                                                                                                                float frameDuration,
                                                                                                                int xPosition,
                                                                                                                int[] yPositions,
                                                                                                                int frameWidth,
                                                                                                                int frameHeight)
        Method for organizing an Animation object with the given paramters when the action strip is all vertical with the same left-most x-position.
        Parameters:
        textureSheet - Texture representing all the frames for animation.
        frames - Amount of animation pictures for a specific action.
        frameDuration - The time between frames in seconds.
        xPosition - The left-most position of all frames. Should be same length as parameter frames.
        yPositions - The upper-most position of each frame in order. Should be same length as parameter frames.
        frameWidth - The standard width of a single frame.
        frameHeight - The standard height of a single frame.
        Returns:
        Animation instance representing an object's specific action for graphical use.
